item.title: Max add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If you don't have time to read, you don't have the time (or the tools) to write. Simple as that." -- Stephen King

item.title: Max add a quote by Arthur C. Clarke
item.description:
"My favourite definition of an intellectual: 'Someone who has been educated beyond his/her intelligence.
[<i>Sources and Acknowledgements</i>: Chapter 19]" -- Arthur C. Clarke

item.title: Max add a quote by Isaac Asimov
item.description: "The saddest aspect of life right now is that science gathers knowledge faster than society gathers wisdom." -- Isaac Asimov

item.title: Max add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The story so far: In the beginning the Universe was created. This has made a lot of people very angry and been widely regarded as a bad move." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Max add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Max add a quote by Issac Asimov
item.description: "There is a cult of ignorance in the United States, and there has always been. The strain of anti-intellectualism has been a constant thread winding its way through our political and cultural life, nurtured by the false notion that democracy means that 'my ignorance is just as good as your knowledge." -- Issac Asimov

item.title: Max add a quote by Lao Tzu
Max add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "The best fighter is never angry." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Max add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Respond intelligently even to unintelligent treatment" -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Max add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Max add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Never memorize something that you can look up." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Max add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "Excellence is never an accident. It is always the result of high intention, sincere effort, and intelligent execution; it represents the wise choice of many alternatives - choice, not chance, determines your destiny." -- Aristotle

item.title: Max add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, therefore, is not an act, but a habit." -- Aristotle

item.title: Max add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "Excellence is an Art Won by Training and Habit. We do not act rightly Because we have Virtue and Excellence, But rather, we have Virtue and Excellence Because we act rightly." -- Aristotle
